content: turn round 5 * k1 yo k2 ssk k1 p2 * row 2 ws sl1wyif sm p7 7 7 repeat from * to * p2tog pm p1 leave the rest of the sts on hold turn round 7 * k2 yo k2 ssk p2 * repeat from * to * row 3 rs sl1wyib sm k until the next marker take out the marker ssk round 9 * k6 p2 * repeat from * to * pm k1 leave the rest of the sts on round 11 * k2 k2tog k2 yo p2 * hold turn repeat from * to * row 4 ws sl1wyif sm p until the next marker take out the marker 4 | urederra socks p2tog pm p1 leave the rest of the round 2 k until the next marker sm sts on hold turn k1 work next round of chart k1 sm k until the end of the round repeat row 3 and 4 until all the heel sts have been worked in the last repeat round 1-2 until you have the row on the rs and ws take out the same number of stitches you had for marker the cast on 56 64 72 sts note take into acount that in the foot last row you take out the marker continue straight as set working lace and k1 on the rs and p1 on the ws on instep and stocking stockinette when the heel turn instructions are stitch on sole stitch until the sock completed you will have 18 20 22 measure approximately 5 cm / 2 sts inches less than the desired foot length gusset remove the stitch marker for the go back to knitting in the round to gusset when working the first round have all the sts back on the needles of the foot the sts from the heel flap must be picked up ending after a round even- numebered of the pattern set up round k9 10 11 place marker this will be the new toe beginning of your round k9 10 11 round 1 k 13 15 17 pm k28 32 pick up 13 15 17 sts from the heel 36 pm k until the end of the round flap border pick up 2 extra sts before working the sts on hold on n1 to round 2 k until the last 2 sts before avoid a hole knit the corresponding marker k2tog sm k2 ssk k until the round of chart pick up 2 extra sts in last 2 sts before the next marker the leg of the sock to avoid a hole k2tog sm k2 ssk k until the end of pick up 13 15 17 sts from the heel the round flap border k9 10 11 until the round 3 k until the end of the round marker slipping the stitch markers as you you should have 76 86 96 sts on the come to them needles repeat round 2-3 until you have a round 1 k23
